scrims_panel_description:
üéÆ Ready to play? Here you can join an existing scrim or create your own match for others to join!

Use the buttons below to participate, and have fun competing with the community.

**Need help? Ask a moderator or check the #help channel.** 

 *Stats can be tracked through the Stats Panel*
scrims_modal_match_name_placeholder: Enter the name for your scrim match
scrims_modal_join_code_placeholder: Enter the join code provided by the host
register_panel_description:
üëã Hello player! To participate in our leagues and scrims, please register your Steam ID. You can also update it at any time or delete your profile if needed.

**Ready to get started?** Use the buttons below!

*Your data is safe and only used for tournament participation.*
stats_panel_description: üìä Here you can view your personal statistics, including match history and performance metrics.
install_panel_description: üõ†Ô∏è Welcome! Use this panel to install, check, or delete the bot's configuration. Please follow the instructions below.
install_panel_field_info_value: Click **Install** to set up the bot, **Check** to verify the installation, or **Delete** to remove all configuration data.
install_panel_footer: Contact an admin if you need help with the installation.
install_modal_path_placeholder: Enter the path where the bot should be installed
